sourcesContent:
import { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
import * as Speech from 'expo-speech'
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'
import { View, Text, TouchableHighlight, Modal } from 'react-native'
import { AppContext } from '../../App';
import NavigationBar from '../components/NavigationBar'
import PlayersScreen from '../components/PlayersScreen'
import NightTimeDialogue from '../data/NightTimeDialogue';
import { AppContextType } from '../types/types'

export default function NightTimePage() {
  const navigation = useNavigation()
  const appContext = useContext(AppContext)
  const [step, setStep] = useState(0)
  const [modalType, setModalType] = useState(undefined)
  const [modalVisible, setModalVisible] = useState(false)
  return (
    <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
      <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'lightblue' }}>
        <Text>Night Time of Day {appContext.dayNumber}</Text>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#cc0066' }}>
          <Text>{NightTimeDialogue(appContext.dayNumber)[step]}</Text>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1, backgroundColor: 'white' }}>
          <TouchableHighlight style={{ width: '100%', height: '100%', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center' }} 
            onPress={() => { doThings(step, setStep, setModalVisible, appContext, navigation) }}>
            <Text>{buttonTexts[step]}</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>
        </View>
      </View>
      <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <NavigationBar previousPage='ItemsPage' nextPage='MorningTimePage'></NavigationBar>
      </View>
      <Modal visible={modalVisible} style={{ flex: 1 }}>
        <View style={{ flex: 9 }}>
          <PlayersScreen modal={modalType}></PlayersScreen>
        </View>
        <View style={{ flex: 1 }}>
          <TouchableHighlight style={{ flex: 1, alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: '#0066ff' }} 
            onPress={() => { doThings(step, setStep, setModalVisible, appContext, navigation) }}>
            <Text>OK</Text>
          </TouchableHighlight>
        </View>
      </Modal>
    </View>
  )
}

async function doThings(step:number, setStep:React.Dispatch<any>, setModalVisible:React.Dispatch<any>, appContext:AppContextType, navigation:any) {
  await Speech.stop()
  Speech.speak(NightTimeDialogue(appContext.dayNumber)[step + 1])
  if (appContext.dayNumber === 0) {
    switch (step) {
      case 0:
      case 1:
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 2:
        appContext.playersInfo.forEach(playerInfo => {
          playerInfo.status = playerInfo.role == 'Blackened' ? 'despair' : 'hope'
        })
        setModalVisible(true)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 3:
        setModalVisible(false)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 4:
        setStep(step + 1)
        navigation.push('MorningTimePage')
    }
  } else if (appContext.dayNumber === 1) {
    switch (step) {
      case 0:
        appContext.playersInfo.forEach(playerInfo => {
          playerInfo.status = 'hope'
        })
        setModalVisible(true)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 1:
        setModalVisible(false)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 2:
        setModalVisible(true)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 3:
        setModalVisible(false)
        setStep(step + 1)
        break
      case 4:
        setStep(step + 1)
        navigation.push('MorningTimePage')
    }
  }
}

const labelText1 = 'Click button below to start the Night Time sequence'
const labelText2 = '"Mm, ahem, this is a school announcement. It is now 10 p.m. As such, it is officially nighttime. \
Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…" \
\n\n \
Press button below when everybody is asleep'
const labelText3 = 'Traitors - Wake up. Press the button below to reveal who the Blackened player is'
const labelText4 = 'U pu pu pu'
const labelText5 = 'Traitors - Go back to sleep. \
\n\n \
Blackened - Wake up. Place the bullet card in front of the player you would like to attack. \
On Night 0, the victim will only lose an item card and will not be killed. \
\n\n \
Press the button below when you are done'
const labelText6 = 'U pu pu pu. Blackened - Go back to sleep.'
const labelTexts = [labelText1, labelText2, labelText3, labelText4, labelText5, labelText6]

const buttonText1 = 'Start'
const buttonText2 = 'Everyone is asleep'
const buttonText3 = 'Reveal the Blackened!'
const buttonText4 = ''
const buttonText5 = 'I am done'
const buttonText6 = 'Start Night Time sequence'
const buttonTexts = [buttonText1, buttonText2, buttonText3, buttonText4, buttonText5, buttonText6]

const labelText1b = '"It is now officially nighttime. Please raise your hand if there is something you’d like to do before going to bed" \
\n\n \
Would anybody like to use a night time card?'
const labelText2b = '"Okay then… sweet dreams, everyone! Good night, sleep tight, don\'t let the bed bugs bite…"'
const labelText3b = 'Person 1 - Resolve your item effect. Person 2 - Resolve your item effect…'
